title: Park and forget
summary: A smart parking app that remembers your car location for you.
description: No more head scratching because you cant remember where you parked. With Android wear support...There are 4 ways to activate parking mode:1.) Automatic park when disconnected from car stereo.     usage:       Click the bluetooth button from the menu.       Select your car Stereo from the list (Car stereo & phone must be paired before this step)2.) NFC: Scanning a Park and forget configured NFC tag.    usage:       Prepare a blank NFC TAG.       Select the NFC button from the menu of the app.       Place the NFC TAG at the back of the phone.       If an intent shows up, select Park and forget 3.) Widget: One button action to park    usage:       Select Park and forget widget from the widget list       Drag the widget to your desktop           4.) Wear: Pressing a button on android wear    usage:       Open Park and forget android wear app.       click on park button     To help you remember where you parked, you can also  add color notes, number notes, letter notes, photo notes.compatbile with:Pioneer MVH-X370BTPinoeer DEH-X6700BTPioneer FH-X720BTPioneer MVH-X370BTPioneer AVH-X2700BSPioneer AVH-270BTPioneer DEH-X4700BTPioneer DEH-X6700BSPioneer AVH-4100NEXPioneer AVH-X3700BHSPioneer SPH-DA120Pioneer DEH-X8700BSKenwood Excelon KDC-X998 Kenwood KDC-BT362Ukenwood DPX501BTKenwood DDX372BTKenwood KMM-BT312UKenwood DDX9702SKenwood DDX672BHKenwood KDC-BT762HDKenwood KDC-BT758HDSony MEXN5100BTSony MEXXB100BTJVC KDX320BTSSKUJVC KWR910BTJVC KDR960BTSJVC KWV21BTJVC KWV41BTAlpine CDE-143BTAlpine CDE-SXM145BTAlpine CDE-153BTAnd other car Stereo with bluetooth connectivity...
descriptionHTML:
No more head scratching because you cant remember where
you parked.

With Android wear support...

There are 4 ways to activate parking mode:
1.) Automatic park when disconnected from car stereo.
usage:
Click the bluetooth button from the menu.
Select your car Stereo from the list (Car stereo & phone must be paired before this step)


2.) NFC: Scanning a Park and forget configured NFC tag.
usage:
Prepare a blank NFC TAG.
Select the NFC button from the menu of the app.
Place the NFC TAG at the back of the phone.
If an intent shows up, select Park and forget

3.) Widget: One button action to park
usage:
Select Park and forget widget from the widget list
Drag the widget to your desktop

4.) Wear: Pressing a button on android wear
usage:
Open Park and forget android wear app.
click on park button

To help you remember where you parked, you can also add color notes, number notes, letter notes, photo notes.

comments: Noticifations are ridiculous I don't need my phone to beep every 3 seconds when I'm parked.  I can't find any settings to turn it off.  Will be uninstalling this worthless app!
Those ads Full screen ads with a count down before you can close it.  Just horrible.  Tried to do an IAP to remove ads and it says I'm not signed into my Google acct.  Waste of code
Must have I think it the best thing ever
Why are the ads everywhere? The huge screen size ad isn't helping at all
This park app is so useful but i don't like the notifications. In general, a recommended useful app
Overall It fun to use and good too have. I wonder if it work on basement
